quote: I love you to the moon and back.
You make my heart skip a beat.
You are doing great and I'm so proud of you.
I am grateful for every moment I spend with you.
In a sea of people, my eyes will always search for you.
You are the sunshine in my life.
I believe in you and your dreams.
You are the missing piece to my puzzle.
You are the apple of my eye.
Every moment spent with you is like a beautiful dream come true.
